title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 April 2015 - XWiki
content:
<gsmeria> has quit  
00:30 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
00:51 <lucaa> has quit  
06:01 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
06:04 <Denis> has quit  
07:06 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
07:07 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:57 <silverdrop> has joined #xwiki  
08:08 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:37 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:42 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:18 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:34 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:37 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
09:41 <martin-h> hi there, looking for xwiki 6.4.4 "wizard that don't come up" experts ? :D  
09:57 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <cjd> has quit  
10:10 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
10:15 <mflorea> has quit  
10:35 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <mflorea> has quit  
10:35 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:57 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:08 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:12 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
11:34 <martin-h> hi vmassol , do you have clue why we found smtp port set to 3025 in 'mail sending" preferences of a fresh xwiki 6.4.4 ?  
11:35 <vmassol> ouch seems a regression  
11:35 <vmassol> something not wanted  
11:35 <vmassol> would be great if you could open a jira issue martin-h and I'll fix it  
11:36 <martin-h> np  
11:45 <martin-h> vmassol, which project do i create the issue ? Xwiki Enterprise ?  
11:45 <silverdr1p> has joined #xwiki  
11:45 <silverdrop> has quit  
12:04 <vmassol> martin-h: XWiki Platform  
12:04 <vmassol> component: mail  
12:04 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI  
12:04 <vmassol> thanks!  
12:08 <martin-h> vmassol, I can't attach a screenshot !?  
12:08 <vmassol> sure  
12:08 <martin-h> I don't see the upload field in jira  
12:09 <vmassol> attach file  
12:09 <vmassol> More menu  
12:10 <martin-h> vmassol, I mean in the issue creation dialog  
12:10 <vmassol> it's after  
12:10 <vmassol> you need to create the issue first  
12:11 <martin-h> Yes. So it is the behavior you want  
12:11 <vmassol> ?  
12:11 <martin-h> Because you could enable file upload in the creation dialog  
12:11 <vmassol> ok didn't know  
12:12 <vmassol> I don't know what's best. My gut feeling was to have the simplest possible form to create an issue but if you think it's a problem we could change that  
12:13 <martin-h> Your choice. I find a bit more straigh-forward for the user to be able to upload a file at creation time, rather than going thru the menus to find the option ;)7  
12:13 <martin-h> but it's not vital  
12:13 <martin-h> \*once you know\*  
12:14 <martin-h> here it is http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12039  
12:14 <vmassol> thanks  
12:15 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:15 <vmassol> re the password it's correct  
12:15 <vmassol> it's only the port that is wrong  
12:16 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:24 <vmassol> martin-h: fixed, thanks!  
12:32 <martin-h> vmassol, thanks to you ;)  
12:32 <silverdr1p> is now known as <silverdrop>  
12:42 <vmassol> has quit  
12:56 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:20 <cjd> has quit  
13:28 <silverdrop> has quit  
13:30 <silverdrop> has joined #xwiki

13:44 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
14:03 <martin-h> has quit  
14:13 <martin-h> has joined #xwiki  
14:16 <fmancinelli> has quit  
14:38 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
14:41 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
15:09 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
15:23 <vmassol> martin-h: now fixed the 2 issues ;)  
15:23 <vmassol> (hopefully)  
15:36 <vmassol> has quit  
16:32 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
16:35 <vmassol> mflorea: are you on strike? :) lol  
16:35 <vmassol> spring cleaning?  
16:36 <mflorea> yep, I had too many issues assigned that I don't plan to work on too soon  
16:36 <vmassol> indeed you had a lot  
16:36 <mflorea> I didn't want to discourage others from working on them :P  
16:36 <vmassol> one can always dream!  
16:37 <mflorea> :)  
16:47 <vmassol> Enygma`: trying the new autocomplete/syntax hilight  
16:47 <vmassol> do you have a jira issue for pages that should be hidden?  
16:47 <vmassol> (in http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/Main/SpaceIndex?space=SyntaxHighlighting )  
16:48 <vmassol> Enygma`: it's missing releases notes at http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/AutoCompletion+Application  
16:48 <vmassol> do we still need to restart XWiki?  
16:58 <tmortagne> vmassol: restart XWiki for what ?  
16:58 <tmortagne> the page indicate that the last version is 3.0  
16:59 <tmortagne> releases note are not imported stuff  
17:06 <lucaa> has quit  
17:08 <vmassol> tmortagne: for making the REST endpoint active  
17:09 <vmassol> there's RN for 2.1 but it's issing for 3.0  
17:09 <vmassol> \*missing  
17:10 <tmortagne> vmassol: just means Enygma`did not put any RN  
17:10 <vmassol> yes that's my point :)  
17:10 <tmortagne> not sure what this have to do with REST  
17:10 <vmassol> no relationship  
17:11 <tmortagne> ok I did not understood "do we still need to restart XWiki?" was not about extensions.xwiki.org itself  
17:11 <vmassol> nope, it was about the extension :)  
17:12 <tmortagne> and yes a to get a REST resource no way around restarting unless it's not a XWikiResource  
17:12 <vmassol> strangely I think it worked but I didn't restart, maybe my fingers restarted it without me knowing though...  
17:12 <tmortagne> but if you are lucky you installed the extension before accessing REST module :D  
17:12 <vmassol> maybe  
17:12 <tmortagne> REST resource are initialized first time you use REST  
17:13 <vmassol> that could explain it  
17:13 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
17:19 <vmassol> For those interested: result of the sprint we did 2 weeks ago: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/RoadmapFreeSprint1  
17:25 <lucaa> has quit  
17:27 <gsmeria> has quit  
17:28 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
17:38 <Enygma`> vmassol: you are right about the hidden pages. I`ve missed them. No issue yet, you can create one if you like.  
17:41 <lucaa> has quit  
17:45 <Pbas> has quit  
17:46 <Bugen\_do> has joined #xwiki
